house_listing.house_description: This single family home built in 1939 has 6 bedroom(s), 7 full bath(s)/2 half bath(s) , 2 car attached garage and approximately 8044 square feet of living area. Rooms include den, family room, master bedroom. Features include view, private pool, private spa, patio, air conditioning, french doors.
house_listing.firm_name: Ideal Properties I Lic. Real Estate Broker
house_listing.residential_listing_-_additional_feature: Balcony, Dishwasher, Foyer, French Doors, Garage Door Opener, OceanAccess, Outdoor Lights, Outdoor Shower, Walk-In Closet(s)
